content.rendered:
Kylian Mbappé is going to part with PSG. Last year he announced not to increase the contract.His contract with PSG ends next June. After that, the French forward wants to leave the club as a free player. Mbappe has already informed PSG of his decision.

British daily The Athletic reports that Mbappe has finalized his decision and informed the club. Now only formalities remain. The report also said that the official announcement will come in the next few months.

However, PSG has not yet announced anything. They are trying their best to keep Mbappe. However, last season Mbappe wanted to sell at a high price. But Mbappe did not agree. A few days ago, PSG president Nasser Al Khelaifi expressed his position on Mbappe. The French club does not want to lose Mbappe in any way.

The Qatari had hoped to retain him. Earlier in 2022, it was reported that Real Madrid had completed a verbal agreement with Mbappe. But within a few days the incident took a new turn. Mbappe signed a huge two-year contract with PSG. That contract expires this June.

So Mbappe will look for a new address for the next season. That is why Real Madrid wants to attract this 25-year-old forward to the team as a free player. Real were rumored to have offered Mbappe in the just-concluded winter transfer window.
